data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Corona Remedies Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from December 15 2025 the Equity Shares of Corona Remedies Ltd (Scrip Code: 544644) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251212-14 dated December 12 2025.
